wikipedia_page.main: Pat Quartermain (born 16 April 1937) is an English former footballer who played for Oxford United and Cambridge United. During his spell at Oxford, he played 285 league games. Although joining Oxford United in 1955 as an amateur, he didn't turn professional until 1962 when the team joined The Football League.After his playing career he managed Clanfield getting them to win the Hellenic Football League cup in the 1973–74 season.
